name: Augment - A Music Game Utilizing Real-Time Scale Estimation
description: This is a music game that estimates the pitch of the instrument being played by the user in real-time, allowing for an intuitive and enjoyable musical experience. It can also be played using instrument apps on tablets and smartphones.
